name: SCP Sanity Preservation Measure
description: Removes images from the Internet's premiere source of metafictional creepypasta nightmare fuel, the SCP Foundation Wiki. When used correctly, prevents 98% of SCP-related heart attacks.
additional_info:
June 17, 2012: Created at midnight while browsing the Internet in the dark. What more do you need to know?

Sept 13, 2013: The Coffin (SCP-895) requires a little bit of extra CSS to remove. Whoops.
